and%20security%20guards%20%E2%80%94%20receive%20a%20phone%20call%20or%20email%20offering%20the%20job%20of%20a%20lifetime.%20A%20key%20role%20on%20a%20major%20film%2C%20or%20TV%20show.%20This%20offer%20comes%20from%20a%20powerful%20woman%20%E2%80%94%20one%20of%20the%20biggest%20producers%20or%20studio%20executives%20in%20the%20industry.%20All%20these%20strivers%20have%20to%20do%20is%20get%20on%20a%20plane%2C%20for%20Jakarta%2C%20immediately.%20But%20when%20they%20land%2C%20there%20is%20no%20producer.%20There%20is%20no%20movie.%20It%E2%80%99s%20all%20a%20fraud.%20This%20is%20the%20incredible%20true%20story%20of%20one%20the%20longest%20and%20strangest%20cons%20in%20history.%20Tag%20along%20as%20two%20long-time%20journalists%20untangle%20the%20story%20of%20the%20Hollywood%20Con%20Queen%20scam%2C%20and%20embark%20upon%20an%20obsessive%20quest%20to%20figure%20out%20who%E2%80%99s%20behind%20it.%22%2C%22actions%22%3A%7B%22view%22%3A%22%2Fch%2F3335281%22%7D%2C%22uri%22%3A%22%2Fch%2F3335281%22%2C%22play_count%22%3A159435%2C%22stat_cover_ext_color%22%3Afalse%2C%22cover_ext_color%22%3A%22-14667680%22%2C%22small_cover_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fis5-ssl.mzstatic.com%2Fimage%2Fthumb%2FPodcasts124%2Fv4%2F37%2F93%2Fc0%2F3793c050-53bf-af03-788d-c45125d5cea5%2Fmza_15689092319381376581.jpeg%2F200x200bb.jpg%22%2C%22big_cover_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fis5-ssl.mzstatic.com%2Fimage%2Fthumb%2FPodcasts124%2Fv4%2F37%2F93%2Fc0%2F3793c050-53bf-af03-788d-c45125d5cea5%2Fmza_15689092319381376581.jpeg%2F600x600bb.jpg%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Chameleon%3A%20Hollywood%20Con%20Queen%22%2C%22author%22%3A%22Campside%20Media%22%2C%22system%22%3A1%2C%22https_cover_url%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fis5-ssl.mzstatic.com%2Fimage%2Fthumb%2FPodcasts124%2Fv4%2F37%2F93%2Fc0%2F3793c050-53bf-af03-788d-c45125d5cea5%2Fmza_15689092319381376581.jpeg%2F400x400bb.jpg%22%2C%22sub_count%22%3A29257%2C%22type%22%3A%22ch%22%2C%22cid%22%3A%223335281%22%7D%2C%7B%22description%22%3A%22What's%20CODE%20SWITCH%3F%20It's%20the%20fearless%20conversations%20about%20race%20that%20you've%20been%20waiting%20for!%20Hosted%20by%20journalists%20of%20color%2C%20our%20podcast%20tackles%20the%20subject%20of%20race%20head-on.%20We%20explore%20how%20it%20impacts%20every%20part%20of%20society%20%E2%80%94%20from%20politics%20and%20pop%20culture%20to%20history%2C%20sports%20and%20everything%20in%20between.%20This%20podcast%20makes%20ALL%20OF%20US%20part%20of%20the%20conversation%20%E2%80%94%20because%20we're%20all%20part%20of%20the%20story.%20%5C%22We're%20talking%20to%20people%20who%20have%20been%20marginalized%20and%20underrepresented%20for%20so%20long%2C%20who%20are%20so%20hungry%20to%20see%20themselves%20represented%20fully%20and%20with%20nuance%20and%20complexity%2C%5C%22%20says%20Shereen%20Marisol%20Meraji%2C%20co-host%20of%20Code%20Switch%2C%20Apple%20Podcasts'%20first-ever%20Show%20of%20the%20Year%20for%202020.%20%5C%22People%20recognize%20that%2C%20because%20we%20had%20been%20having%20these%20conversations%20for%20so%20many%20years%20in%20advance%2C%20we're%20a%20trusted%20place%20where%20they%20could%20go%20to%20better%20understand%20all%20the%20stories%20about%20race%20filling%20up%20their%20newsfeeds%20and%20social%20channels.%5C%22%20Their%20weekly%20podcast%20launched%20in%202016%20but%20truly%20came%20into%20its%20own%20during%20this%20historic%2C%20transformative%20year%2C%20as%20Meraji%20and%20co-host%20Gene%20Demby%20examine%20issues%20of%20racial%2C%20ethnic%2C%20and%20cultural%20identity%20through%20frank%20one-on-one%20discussions%20and%20incisive%20non-fiction.%20In%20a%20year%20dominated%20by%20discourse%20about%20race%2C%20this%20indispensable%20show%20furthered%20them%20by%20providing%20powerful%20and%20timely%20insight%2C%20offering%20diverse%20and%20empathetic%20personal%20perspectives%20to%20a%20broad%20audience.%20%5C%22There%20are%20certain%20lenses%20that%20we%20are%20bringing%20into%2C%20both%20as%20journalists%20and%20the%20people%20that%20we're%20bringing%20to%20these%20stories%2C%5C%22
